channel.title: Moparclassic: Hide combat lvl next to name and right click

item.title: Moparclassic: Hide combat lvl next to name and right click
item.dc:creator: @Nicholas2 Nicholas_
item.description:
@Nicholas2 wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:21, topic:429737"][quote author=elyad link=topic=532416.msg3892268#msg3892268 date=1326977792]
Theres all kinds of things in RSC before what we know it as today, There never use to be a wild allowing players to attack allover, There also use to be on Stat Menu Evil Magic and Prayer, Carpentry, Which were all later removed of the list before being implemented i believe.

Maybe in the future, We could consider adding additional new skills like Evil/Good Prayer/Magic, This gives players another option of what path they want to go down with there Character, And adds the addition of another type of player. Pure/Unpure and people can test which type of character benefits them and Evil/Good Prayer/Magic can all have different pros and cons.
[/quote]
As far as I know, Good Magic was useless as hell.[/quote]

There was no real discernible difference between good and evil spells, besides the name and the fact that there was one evil magic spell called fear. They both had combat spells…

Read full topic

item.title: Moparclassic: Hide combat lvl next to name and right click
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“NoLives, post:34, topic:429737”]Okay so.
Since noone wants this THAT bad, can you say clearly that its not going to be added?
mopar[/quote]

I’m not going to add it, probably the main developers aren’t. But, like I said, if someone wants to do it and submit a patch or pull request, I’m sure it will be added just for the sake of completeness.

Read full topic

item.source: Moparclassic: Hide combat lvl next to name and right click

item.title: Moparclassic: Hide combat lvl next to name and right click
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:29, topic:429737”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=532416.msg3892357#msg3892357 date=1326994705]

If you want to add it in, add it in with an option to enable or disable it, and submit a pull request or patch.

Don’t allow this to be added in. We’re replicating RSC. “Rsc Used to have this”, they use to have it. Took it out because it was not pointless. We’re not replicating the RSC Version back in 2000.

I said add it in with an option to enable or disable it, that way people running the server could choose which way they wanted it. The server we are running wouldn’t have it enabled.
[/quote]I hate the idea of having users be able to turn everything on/off. To me it seems unprofessional and goofy. We’re going for a solid replica here.

EDIT: Also, it’s hard to replicate things that hardly anyone has actually experienced and that is not currently available to us in this case. Other custom ideas just seem silly.[/quote]

I didn’t say players, I meant people running the server.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ecko wrote:

[quote=“slava, post:23, topic:429737”]There’s reason why jagex scrapped all of those ideas (good/bad magic, all map wild, etc…) THE IDEAS SUCKED. Complete RSC replica ftw[/quote]was partly cause they got rid of their old forums, which stopped all the pking wars (sabre vs razor vs cwc, etc).

other reason was new players would get killed outside lumbridge with no clue as to what is going on

Read full topic

item.title: Moparclassic: Hide combat lvl next to name and right click
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:28, topic:429737”][quote author=The Djinn link=topic=532416.msg3892208#msg3892208 date=1326963214]

If you want to add it in, add it in with an option to enable or disable it, and submit a pull request or patch.

Don’t allow this to be added in. We’re replicating RSC. “Rsc Used to have this”, they use to have it. Took it out because it was not pointless. We’re not replicating the RSC Version back in 2000.
[/quote]
I said add it in with an option to enable or disable it, that way people running the server could choose which way they wanted it. The server we are running wouldn’t have it enabled.[/quote]I hate the idea of having users be able to turn everything on/off. To me it seems unprofessional and goofy. We’re going for a solid replica here.

EDIT: Also, it’s hard to replicate things that hardly anyone has actually experienced and that is not currently available to us in this case. Other custom ideas just seem silly.

Read full topic

If you want to add it in, add it in with an option to enable or disable it, and submit a pull request or patch.
[/quote]
Don’t allow this to be added in. We’re replicating RSC. “Rsc Used to have this”, they use to have it. Took it out because it was not pointless. We’re not replicating the RSC Version back in 2000.[/quote]

item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“waj, post:22, topic:429737”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=532416.msg3892294#msg3892294 date=1326982266]

Theres all kinds of things in RSC before what we know it as today, There never use to be a wild allowing players to attack allover, There also use to be on Stat Menu Evil Magic and Prayer, Carpentry, Which were all later removed of the list before being implemented i believe.

Maybe in the future, We could consider adding additional new skills like Evil/Good Prayer/Magic, This gives players another option of what path they want to go down with there Character, And adds the addition of another type of player. Pure/Unpure and people can test which type of character benefits them and Evil/Good Prayer/Magic can all have different pros and cons.

As far as I know, Good Magic was useless as hell.
[/quote]
The answer was in your sentence[/quote]
You know, I almost laughed there.
